value.title: Xiaomi’s Self-Driving Test Car Spotted with a Lidar Sensor on the Roof
value.excerpt: Apparently, a car blogger who goes by the username Deroy has shared a picture of Xiaomi’s self-driving test car. The car can be seen to have a sleek design with a lidar sensor on the roof.

value.title: China’s Baidu joins race to develop driverless cars
value.excerpt: With no one at the wheel, a self-driving taxi developed by tech giant Baidu Inc. is rolling down a Beijing street when its sensors spot the corner of a delivery cart jutting into its lane.

value.title: Tesla Reportedly Lays Off 200 Autopilot Employees
value.excerpt: In early June, Tesla CEO Elon Musk reportedly told executives that Tesla needed to cut 10% of its staff, based on a "super bad feeling" about the economy. Now, as Tesla pares back its workforce, new reports are highlighting where some of those cuts are taking place.

value.title: Tesla Fires 200 People Working on Its Unfinished Self-Driving Tech
value.excerpt: Tesla is gutting a part of its Autopilot department, cutting around 200 jobs from its office in San Mateo, California, CNBC reports.
